creator: Virgo SAS
descriptionHtml:
An easy-to-use, cross-chain wallet on your phone!
All-in-one decentralized cryptocurrency secure wallet.

Virgo Wallet is one of the most trustworthy crypto wallets on the market, used daily by thousands of users.

The extension supports hundreds of tokens on a dozen chains, including Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, Huobi Deco Chain, Chronos Chain, Kucoin Chain, Ethereum Classic, Ethereum Pow, Ethereal Fair and others.

What do our users like most about Virgo Wallet?

Send and receive crypto from our friends in security, exchange tokens at the best price across multiple chains with Atomic Swap technology, earn tokens with our airdrops, use your favorite Web3 dApps, view the price and latest news of tokens.

Virgo Wallet also allows you to :

Store and trade securely popular digital assets directly with each other. We support Ethereum (ETH), BNB Chain (BNB), Polygon (MATIC), Avalanche (AVAX), our own token (VGO), and hundreds of other tokens!

Add your friends' contact addresses to simplify sending. Rename them, add them as favourites and write notes.

Choose the currency that suits you best (USD) (EUR) and more coming soon!

Cancel your transactions a few seconds after sending.

Add, import, and manage multiple wallets.

Add your own custom tokens.

Other features coming soon include dark theme, dApps store, NFTs and more.

Join the thousands of users who already trust our wallet, install Virgo Wallet now!
descriptionShort: An easy-to-use, cross-chain wallet on your phone!
title: Virgo Wallet

creator: Virgo SAS
descriptionHtml:
Virgo Wallet, The Rewarding Crypto Wallet!

With Virgo Wallet, users are encouraged and rewarded for their engagement, with features such as airdrops, rewards programs, referrals and more. Virgo Wallet redefines the crypto wallet experience by offering not only security and efficient management of digital assets but also an exciting opportunity to earn back.

The application supports hundreds of tokens on a dozen chains, including Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, Huobi Deco Chain, Chronos Chain, Kucoin Chain, Ethereum Classic, Ethereum Pow, Ethereal Fair and others.

What do our users like most about Virgo Wallet?

Receiving rewards, Send and receive crypto from our friends in security, exchange tokens at the best price across multiple chains with Atomic Swap technology, earn tokens with our airdrops, use your favorite Web3 dApps, view the price and latest news of tokens.

Virgo Wallet also allows you to :

Virgo Wallet integrates Connect Wallet, an open-source implementation that guarantees a secure connection between your mobile wallets and decentralized applications (dApps), giving you the opportunity to interact with complete confidence.

Store and trade securely popular digital assets directly with each other. We support Ethereum (ETH), BNB Chain (BNB), Polygon (MATIC), Avalanche (AVAX), our own token (VGO), and hundreds of other tokens!

Add your friends' contact addresses to simplify sending. Rename them, add them as favorites and write notes.

Choose the currency that suits you best (USD) (EUR) and more coming soon!

Cancel your transactions a few seconds after sending.

Add, import, and manage multiple wallets.

Add your own custom tokens.

Other features coming soon include a mobile app, dark theme, dApps store and more.

Join the thousands of users who already trust our wallet, install Virgo Wallet extension now!
descriptionShort: Virgo Wallet, The Rewarding Crypto Wallet!

The application supports +500 tokens on +20 blockchains, including Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, Heco Chain, Celo, Base, Optimism, Arbitrum and others.

What do our users like most about Virgo Wallet?

Receiving rewards, Send and receive crypto from our friends in security, exchange tokens at the best price across multiple chains with Atomic Swap technology, earn tokens with our airdrops, use your favorite Web3 dApps, view the price and latest news of tokens.

Store and trade securely popular digital assets directly with each other. We support Ethereum (ETH), BNB Chain (BNB), Polygon (MATIC), Avalanche (AVAX), our own token (VGO), and hundreds of other tokens!

Add your friends' contact addresses to simplify sending. Rename them, add them as favorites and write notes.

Choose your preferred currency from USD, EUR, IDR and +20 others.

Cancel your transactions a few seconds after sending.

Add, import, and manage multiple wallets.

Add your own custom tokens and your NFTs.

Join the thousands of users who already trust our wallet, Install Virgo Wallet App now!

title:
Virgo: Crypto Wallet
1.0.11

creator: Virgo SAS
descriptionHtml:
Virgo Wallet is your go-to crypto wallet that rewards you for staying engaged, all while keeping your assets secure and accessible. Whether you're a crypto enthusiast or just getting started, Virgo Wallet makes managing and growing your digital assets easy, rewarding, and safe. Discover our innovative Reward Center and start earning today!

Key Features:

Reward Center: Complete quests, earn XP, and climb the ranks to unlock exclusive rewards. Virgo Wallet turns your crypto journey into an adventure with real incentives.

Airdrops: Join our weekly airdrops and earn free tokens just by being a part of the Virgo Wallet community.

Buy & Swap: Easily buy, swap, and manage a wide variety of cryptocurrencies—all within the wallet. It’s quick, secure, and hassle-free.

Multi-Wallet Management: Add, import, and manage multiple wallets all in one place with our user-friendly “multi-wallet” feature.

NFTs & Web3: Seamlessly interact with NFTs and Web3 applications, opening up endless possibilities in the digital economy.

Blockchain Switching: Explore and switch between over 20 blockchains effortlessly, giving you the freedom to navigate the crypto world with ease.

Send & Receive Crypto: Effortlessly send and receive cryptocurrencies with just a few taps, making transactions simple and secure.

Contact Book: Save and manage your frequently used addresses in our convenient contact book, streamlining your crypto transactions.

Why Choose Virgo Wallet?

Virgo Wallet isn't just a place to store your crypto, it's a dynamic platform that rewards you for your engagement. With robust security, a wide range of features, and our innovative Reward Center, Virgo Wallet is designed to enhance your crypto experience in every way.

Download Virgo Wallet today and start earning rewards as you manage your digital assets securely and efficiently.
descriptionShort: Virgo Wallet, The Rewarding Crypto Wallet!
